Question: In August 2005, this person was voted in as vice president of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.
Hints: The next year, this person landed a lead role on the ABC television pilot of Bosom Buddies, playing the role of Kip Wilson.
"It changed my desires about working in movies," this person told Rolling Stone.
On March 10, 2008, this person was on hand at the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame to induct The Dave Clark Five.
